content: ***bulky scrappy sweater*** is a perfect project for using up all your scrap yarns from other projects holding the yarn together by mixing colors creates interesting color combos using all fingering weight yarn this sweater is super squishy and cozy perfect accessory for sweater weather seasons and adding style to your fall and winter wardrobe pattern information knit flat for body and circular for sleeves pattern is for one size can be adjusted as needed for length and width because there were so many scraps of yarn yardage was hard to determine this one is knit for a 48 /122cm bust yarn & supplies fingering weight yarn held 5 strands at a time perfect for using up advent skeins mini skeins extra fingering weight yarn from projects approx 856 grams needles size us 15/ 10mm and us 17/ 12mm in 40 / 101cm circular can you for sleeves or double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 8 stitches and 9 row in stockinette stitch = 4 /10cm on size us 17/ 12mm needle or size needed to obtain gauge please take the time to check the gauge
